snippet.title: Brain Champion - Mobile Gaming on Nokia C2-01
snippet.description:
I discovered my old Nokia C2-01 handset - charged it up and had an evening of playing some of the games still on it. Surprisingly fun although sometimes hard to play through the camera viewfinder as I had to try to play by feel where the buttons are.

This is a quick off-screen video of Brain Champion (or Brain Champ) which is clearly inspired by the Dr Kawashima's Brain Training series that was so popular on the Nintendo DS. This is a quick look at the Daily Challenge mode and features 4 challenges. Apologies for the poor performance in the Maths challenges - I couldn't see the buttons due to the camera so was playing by feel and made a few mistakes

I try to keep the phone still and apologies that my thumb sometimes comes into shot.

If you enjoyed this video and want to see more or if you played this game back in the day (or still do) then I'd love to know.

This video is uploaded under the Fair Use policy - no money is being made from this video

Enjoy!
